name: Word Spa: Vistas
description:
Are you smart enough to solve all the cross word puzzles?

Packed with excitement this word game is definitely a brain teasing challenge!

- Stimulate your brain by visiting a variety of scenic locations.
- Spell words by connecting letters. Easy to play, difficult to master!
- Challenge your vocabulary
- Starts easy but ramps up quickly!
- A lifetime to master!

Word Spa: Vistas is a perfect blend of crossword puzzle and brain teasers. It’s a highly addicting word puzzle game!

Play Word Spa: Vistas in your free time to work out your brain and relax!

Start playing today and join the Word Spa: Vistas Revolution!
